articles.author: RTÉ News
articles.title: Johnson facing questions over coronavirus lockdown
articles.description: British Prime Minister Boris Johnson is facing calls for clarity after placing the UK on a police-enforced lockdown with drastic new measures in the fight against the coronavirus outbreak.
articles.content:
British Prime Minister Boris Johnson is facing calls for clarity after placing the UK on a police-enforced lockdown with drastic new measures in the fight against the coronavirus outbreak.

articles.author: RTÉ News
articles.title: Coronavirus: One more death, 204 new cases in Ireland
articles.description: The Department of Health has announced that another patient diagnosed with Covid-19 has died. There are 204 new cases of coronavirus in the Republic of Ireland bringing the total number of cases to 1,329.
articles.content:
The Department of Health has announced that another patient diagnosed with Covid-19 has died. 
The patient was a male in the east of the country. There have now been seven Covid-19 related deaths in Ireland.
There are 204 new cases of coronavirus in the Rep… [+458 chars]

articles.author: RTÉ News
articles.title: German state to take in Italian coronavirus patients
articles.description: Hospitals in the German state of Saxony will take on at least six Italian coronavirus patients who are unable to receive treatment in their own country.
articles.content:
Hospitals in the German state of Saxony will take on at least six Italian coronavirus patients who are unable to receive treatment in their own country.

articles.author: RTÉ Sport
articles.title: Guardiola donates €1m to help fight coronavirus
articles.description: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola has donated €1m towards providing medical equipment for the fight against the coronavirus in his native Spain.
articles.content:
Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola has donated €1m towards providing medical equipment for the fight against the coronavirus in his native Spain.
